competition_summary.context: competition. In August 2023, the FDA approved EYLEA HD for the treatment of patients with wAMD, DME, and DR. As described in "Collaboration, License, and Other Agreements - Sanofi - Immuno-Oncology " above, effective July 1, 2022, the Company became solely responsible for the research, development, and commercialization of Libtayo worldwide and began recording net product sales of Libtayo outside the United States. Collaboration Revenue Sanofi Collaboration Revenue Three Months Ended September 3
